summary: This bill, the Facilitating the Deployment of Infrastructure with Greater Internet Transactions And Legacy Applications Act (or Facilitating DIGITAL Applications Act), mandates the Assistant Secretary of Commerce for Communications and Information to report to Congress on barriers to establishing online portals for processing Form 299s related to communications use authorizations. The report is due 90 days after enactment and then every 60 days until the relevant Secretaries establish online portals. The bill defines key terms like 'communications use,' 'covered land,' and 'Form 299,' and specifies the congressional committees to receive the reports.
